name: Traditional Medicine Virtual 2020
content: Magnus Group cordially invites you to join us at our webinar entitled “Traditional Medicine Virtual 2020” during September 28-29, 2020 with the Theme: “Discovering the nature based healing strategies” The purpose of the Traditional Medicine Virtual 2020 is to gather the scattered remedies of natural healing to achieve good health as well as to diagnose and prevent the disease and its cause. Traditional Medicine Virtual 2020 consist of a lecture, presentation, workshop, and seminars from the experts, doctors, professors, dedicated professionals, scientists and young scholars. Scientific Session: Traditional Medicine Ethnomedicine Natural Therapies Yoga Therapies Body Therapies Music Therapy Massage Therapies Mind Therapies COVID-19 And Treatment Alternative Medicine Holistic Medicine Aromatic Medicine Acupuncture Herbal Medicine Homeopathic Medicine Phytomedicine Nutrition And Diet Medicinal Plants Biofeedback Mechanism Unani And Siddha Medicine Ayurveda Integrative Medicine In Healthcare For Scientific Sessions PS: https://www.magnuswebinars.com/traditional-medicine-virtual/information/scientific-sessions For Abstract submission PS: https://www.magnuswebinars.com/traditional-medicine-virtual/abstract For Registration PS: https://www.magnuswebinars.com/traditional-medicine-virtual/register Dates: September 28-29, 2020 For more details visit: https://www.magnuswebinars.com/traditional-medicine-virtual/ Email: traditionalmedicine@magnusmeetings.com Office: +1 (702) 988-2320 Whatsapp: +1 (434) 381 1007
